name: Water Slide Kids
description:
Our Team proudly presents:  Water Slide Kids!

So, the game has got 18 Levels + 2 Bosses. It has  got many Bugs and Glitches. but it is possible, but sometimes you must cheat a little bit Anyways, send a commend with a screenshot from the credits of this game. If the killbox doesn't work and you are falling and falling, just press k for Restart. We are working to make WSK to a full game, so support us by reporting any glitch or bug. Thank you.
